title: Public health use and lessons learned from a statewide SARS-CoV-2 wastewater monitoring program (MiNET)
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Nishita D'Souza, Alexis M. Porter, Joan B. Rose, Erin Dreelin, Susan E. Peters, Penny J. Nowlin, Samantha Carbonell, Kyle Cissell, Yili Wang, Matthew T. Flood, Andri T. Rachmadi, Chuanwu Xi, Peter Song, Shannon Briggs, the Michigan Network for Environmental Health and Technology (MiNET) consortium
